title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
NOTE: On the AP Exam, to earn a point for a rubric row, responses will need to meet all criteria for that row.

Points earned:

+1 [Skill 2.B] The response includes a code segment that implements an algorithm used in the program that includes sequencing, selection, and iteration.

+1 [Skill 2.B] The response explains in detailed steps how the selected algorithm works. The explanation must be detailed enough for someone else to be able to recreate the algorithm.

Do NOT award a point if:

● the description of the algorithm does not match the included program code.

● the code segment consisting of the selected algorithm is not included in the written response.
descriptions:
